Unknown.translation: The praise of the lotus feet of Satguru Ii is comprehension. It is indeed wonderful. Salutations time and again.

Unknown.translation: They are tender than the tenderness of the whole world. They are indeed comfortably cool. No other fragrance matches them.

Unknown.translation: The disciple, who lives ever in attendance of the holy feet of the True Satguru Ii and has worked hard on meditation of Lord's name, has relished the supernatural elixir of Naam Simran.

lines.gurmukhi: rUp kY AnUp rUp mn mnsw bkq; AkQ kQw ibnod ibsmY ibsm hY [80[

Unknown.translation: The beauty of Satguru's lotus feet is exemplary. The desire and faculty of mind tires describing it. Their praise indescribable. This wonder of wonders is astonishing. (80)
